verses.verse: Now the <S%H5175>serpent<s%> was <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H6175>crafty<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H9130>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6213>made.<s%> And he <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H637>"Indeed,<s%> <S%H3588><s%> has <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> 'You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> from <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden<s%>'?"
And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5175>serpent,<s%> "From the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden<s%> we may <S%H398>eat;<s%>

but from the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H559>said,<s%> 'You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> from it or <S%H5060>touch<s%> it, <S%H6435>lest<s%> you <S%H4191>die.<s%>' "
And the <S%H5175>serpent<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H802>woman,<s%> "You <S%H4191>surely<s%> shall not <S%H4191>die!<s%>

"For <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> that in the <S%H3117>day<s%> you <S%H398>eat<s%> from it your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> will be <S%H6491>opened,<s%> and you will be like <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3045>knowing<s%> <S%H9185>good<s%> and <S%H9563>evil.<s%>"

When the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H6086>tree<s%> was <S%H2896>good<s%> for <S%H3978>food,<s%> and that it was a <S%H8378>delight<s%> to the <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and that the <S%H6086>tree<s%> was <S%H2530>desirable<s%> to make [one] <S%H7919>wise,<s%> she <S%H3947>took<s%> from its <S%H6529>fruit<s%> and <S%H398>ate;<s%> and she <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> to her <S%H376>husband<s%> with her, and he <S%H398>ate.<s%>

Then the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H8147>both<s%> of them were <S%H6491>opened,<s%> and they <S%H3045>knew<s%> that they were <S%H5903>naked;<s%> and they <S%H8609>sewed<s%> <S%H8384>fig<s%> <S%H5929>leaves<s%> <S%H8609>together<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H1992>themselves<s%> <S%H9118>loin<s%> <S%H9118>coverings.<s%>

And they <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1980>walking<s%> in the <S%H1588>garden<s%> in the <S%H7307>cool<s%> of the <S%H3117>day,<s%> and the <S%H120>man<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H2244>hid<s%> themselves from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden.<s%>
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to the <S%H120>man,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H335>"Where<s%> are you?"

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of Thee in the <S%H1588>garden,<s%> and I was <S%H3372>afraid<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> I was <S%H5903>naked;<s%> so I <S%H2244>hid<s%> myself."

And He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>"Who<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> you that you were <S%H5903>naked<s%>? Have you <S%H398>eaten<s%> from the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you not to <S%H398>eat<s%>?"

And the <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> Thou <S%H5414>gavest<s%> [to be] with me, she <S%H5414>gave<s%> me from the <S%H6086>tree,<s%> and I <S%H398>ate.<s%>"

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> you have <S%H6213>done<s%>?" And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H5175>serpent<s%> <S%H5378>deceived<s%> me, and I <S%H398>ate.<s%>"

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5175>serpent,<s%> <S%H3588>"Because<s%> you have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2088>this,<s%> <S%H779>Cursed<s%> are you <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H929>cattle,<s%> And <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H9130>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field;<s%> On your <S%H1512>belly<s%> shall you <S%H1980>go,<s%> And <S%H6083>dust<s%> shall you <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H9132>life;<s%>

And I will <S%H7896>put<s%> <S%H342>enmity<s%> <S%H996>Between<s%> you and the <S%H802>woman,<s%> And <S%H996>between<s%> your <S%H2233>seed<s%> and her <S%H2233>seed;<s%> He shall <S%H7779>bruise<s%> you on the <S%H7218>head,<s%> And you shall <S%H7779>bruise<s%> him on the <S%H6119>heel.<s%>"

To the <S%H802>woman<s%> He <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will <S%H7235>greatly<s%> <S%H7235>multiply<s%> Your <S%H6093>pain<s%> in <S%H2032>childbirth,<s%> In <S%H6089>pain<s%> you shall <S%H3205>bring<s%> <S%H3205>forth<s%> <S%H1121>children;<s%> Yet your <S%H8669>desire<s%> shall be for your <S%H376>husband,<s%> And he shall <S%H4910>rule<s%> over you."

Then to <S%H121>Adam<s%> He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>"Because<s%> you have <S%H8085>listened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your <S%H802>wife,<s%> and have <S%H398>eaten<s%> from the <S%H6086>tree<s%> about <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> from it'; <S%H779>Cursed<s%> is the <S%H127>ground<s%> <S%H5668>because<s%> of you; In <S%H6093>toil<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of it <S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H9132>life.<s%>
"Both <S%H6975>thorns<s%> and <S%H1863>thistles<s%> it shall <S%H6779>grow<s%> for you; And you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6212>plants<s%> of the <S%H7704>field;<s%>

By the <S%H2188>sweat<s%> of your <S%H639>face<s%> You shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H5704>Till<s%> you <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H127>ground,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> from it you were <S%H3947>taken;<s%> For you are <S%H6083>dust,<s%> And to <S%H6083>dust<s%> you shall <S%H7725>return.<s%>"
Now the <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> his wife's <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H2332>Eve,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> she was the <S%H517>mother<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> [the] <S%H2416>living.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3801>garments<s%> of <S%H5785>skin<s%> for <S%H121>Adam<s%> and his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and <S%H3847>clothed<s%> them.

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> the <S%H120>man<s%> has <S%H1961>become<s%> like <S%H259>one<s%> of Us, <S%H3045>knowing<s%> <S%H9185>good<s%> and <S%H9563>evil;<s%> and <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> he <S%H7971>stretch<s%> out his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> from the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H9132>life,<s%> and <S%H398>eat,<s%> and <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%>" â€“

therefore the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> him out from the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden,<s%> to <S%H5647>cultivate<s%> the <S%H127>ground<s%> from <S%H834>which<s%> he was <S%H3947>taken.<s%>

So He <S%H1644>drove<s%> the <S%H120>man<s%> out; and at the <S%H6924>east<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%> He <S%H7931>stationed<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubim,<s%> and the <S%H3858>flaming<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> which <S%H2015>turned<s%> every direction, to <S%H8104>guard<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H9132>life.<s%>
